fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Serve drinks at someone's house each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target leaves their house, you will serve drinks to them. They will randomly visit one of their neighbors instead of their original target. They will be notified of this.
- If you serve drinks to a visitor, they will randomly visit one of your target's neighbors instead. They will be notified of this.
- If you attempt to serve drinks at the house of a Town Power or Town Killing role, they will turn you away. Both you and your target will be notified of this.
- You have no effect on the Transporter, Witch, or any Mafia or killing roles.
- You may not serve drinks at the same house two nights in a row.
